In the empty vastness of space, it is imperative to not lose your bearings. I've built a computer that will guide me safely through the void.
The first tab always shows Planet Minecraft, so I can always return home.
The second tab always shows where I am. I'm not sure a case will ever arise where I do not know where I am, but these kinds of things can never be forseen.
The third tab shows the destination, which is selected through coordinates (use the field to input).
Additionally, various security messages can be displayed:
This means that the computer has too little energy.
This means that the ship's computer room is not 100% sealed.
This means that there is no neon power generator in the space ship.
